headline: A Look At Digital Realty (DLR) Valuation After New Buy Ratings From Major Investment Banks
summary: Digital Realty Trust (DLR) is back in the spotlight after Deutsche Bank and Goldman Sachs both initiated coverage with Buy ratings, focusing on data center demand tied to AI and cloud infrastructure themes. See our latest analysis for Digital Realty Trust. Recent attention from Deutsche Bank and Goldman Sachs comes after a softer patch in the share price, with a 30-day share price return showing a decline of 5.44% and a 90-day share price return showing a decline of 11.61%, even as the 3-year...
